creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
text:
I think this has been fixed, please check a recent nightly build. If not, please
include more details on how to reproduce it - on what requests/pages it happens,
etc.

This has now been fixed in the CVS.

The problem was that Tomcat wasn't very happy when there was no ROOT context 
configured.  This caused it to generate the NPE when trying to report the 
error.  Now it will generate the expected 404 response.

With RC1, you can "fix" this by defining a ROOT context (corresponding to 
http://tomcat.mycompany.com/).  Or you can just wait for RC2.
